Samvaad_key1: Find a partner and have a conversation on any two of the three topics given below.
Samvaad_key3: Who is your biggest inspiration in life?
Samvaad_key4: What do you admire about them?
Samvaad_key5: What qualities of theirs do you want to adopt?
Samvaad_key20: Is peer pressure harmful or beneficial to individuals?
Samvaad_key21: What are some ways in which in which peer pressure can be beneficial?
Samvaad_key22: What are some ways in which peer pressure can be harmful?
Samvaad_key23: How can one resist peer pressure?
Samvaad_key24: When have you been a victim of peer pressure?
Samvaad_key25: Do people face peer pressure in NavGurukul? How can it be improved?
Samvaad_key26: Resources to study about peer pressure
Samvaad_key31:
1- Addictive Behaviors - व्यसनकारी बरताव
2- Unpredictable - जिसके स्वभाव आदि के बारे में पूर्वानुमान न लगाया जा सके
3- Adolescent - तेरह से उन्नीस वर्ष की आयु का
4- Vulnerable - घाव लगाने योग्य
5- Gambling - जुआ खेलना
6- Addiction - बुरी आदत
7- Problematic - अनिश्चित
8- Encouraging - प्रोत्साहक
9- Apologize - क्षमा मांगना
10- Experimentation - प्रयोग

Samvaad_key36: How can people fight with alcoholism?
